lead_paragraph: Jason Day assured himself a return to the top of the world ranking, replacing Jordan Spieth, when he advanced to the semifinals of the W.G.C. Match Play Championship in Austin, Tex., on Saturday.

headline.main: Jason Day Will Reclaim Top Spot

snippet: Jason Day assured himself a return to the top of the world ranking, replacing Jordan Spieth, when he advanced to the semifinals of the W.G.C. Match Play Championship in Austin, Tex., on Saturday.
abstract: Jason Day advances to WGC Match Play Championship semifinals in Austin, Tex; other golf news and scores noted.
